typeDescription: A model of a container that holds small amounts of samples in a microfluidic chip.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of this Object.

fields.name: ID
fields.description: ID of this Object.

fields.name: Object
fields.description: Object of this Object.

metadata.value: The object reference of this object.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Type of this Object.

fields.name: Notebook
fields.description: Notebook this object belongs to.

fields.name: Objects
fields.description: Objects that represent instances of this model.

fields.name: Synonyms
fields.description: List of possible alternative names this model goes by.

fields.name: Deprecated
fields.description: Indicates that this model is historical and no longer used in the lab.

fields.name: Authors
fields.description: The person who created this model.

fields.name: ProductDocumentationFiles
fields.description: PDFs of product documentation provided by the supplier of this model.

fields.name: Expires
fields.description: Indicates if containers of this model expire after a given amount of time.

fields.name: ShelfLife
fields.description: The length of time after DateCreated that containers of this model are recommended for use before they should be discarded.

fields.name: UnsealedShelfLife
fields.description: The length of time after DateUnsealed that containers of this model are recommended for use before they should be discarded.

fields.name: ExpirationHazard
fields.description: Indicates if containers of this model become hazardous once they are expired and therefore must be automatically disposed of when they pass their expiration date.

fields.name: DefaultStorageCondition
fields.description: The condition in which containers of this model are stored when not in use by an experiment; this condition may be overridden by the specific storage condition of any given container.

fields.name: StorageBuffer
fields.description: Indicates that containers of this model come stocked from the manufacturer with a storage buffer inside of the container.

fields.name: StorageBufferVolume
fields.description: Indicates the amount of storage buffer containers of this model come stocked with.

fields.name: InstrumentSchematics
fields.description: Detailed drawings of the instrument that explain its capabilities and limitations.

fields.name: ImageFile
fields.description: A photo of this model of container.

fields.name: ImageFileScale
fields.description: The scale relating pixels of ImageFile to real world distance.

fields.name: Schematics
fields.description: Detailed drawings of the container that explain its capabilities and limitations.

fields.name: Reusability
fields.description: Indicates that this container can be used repeatedly.

fields.name: Ampoule
fields.description: Indicates a sealed vessel containing a measured quantity of substance, meant for single-use.

fields.name: Hermetic
fields.description: Indicates if this container has an airtight seal at its aperture.

fields.name: Squeezable
fields.description: Indicates this container must be squeezed in order to have its contents removed.

fields.name: PermanentlySealed
fields.description: Indicates if this model of container is permanently sealed closed and can not be opened to transfer anything into or out of it.

fields.name: Opaque
fields.description: Indicates if the exterior of this container blocks the transmission of light.

fields.name: CleaningMethod
fields.description: Indicates the type of cleaning that is employed for this model of container before reuse.

fields.name: TareWeight
fields.description: The mean weight of empty containers of this model. Experimental tare weights of new containers of this model must be within 5% of this weight.

fields.name: TareWeightDistribution
fields.description: The statistical distribution of the mean weight of empty containers of this model.

fields.name: ContainerMaterials
fields.description: The materials of which this container is made that come in direct contact with the samples it contains.

fields.name: Coating
fields.description: The molecule that coats the interior of this container.

fields.name: Treatment
fields.description: The treatment, if any, on the interior of this container.

fields.name: PreferredBalance
fields.description: Indicates the recommended balance type for weighing a sample in this type of container.

fields.name: PreferredCamera
fields.description: Indicates the recommended camera type for taking an image of a sample in this type of container.

fields.name: CompatibleCameras
fields.description: Indicates camera types capable of taking an image of a sample in this type of container.

fields.name: PreferredIllumination
fields.description: The illumination source that should be used when acquiring images of this container.

fields.name: DisposableCaps
fields.description: Indicates if this container uses interchangeable caps that are disposable; i.e. the cap on the container could be changed to another equivalent cap at any time.

fields.name: Transportable
fields.description: Indicates that this container can be used to move its contents through the lab removing the need to individually act on the objects it holds.

fields.name: Immobile
fields.description: Indicates if this container is affixed to its location and can not be moved.

fields.name: DetergentSensitive
fields.description: Indicates if the container should not be used for holding detergent-containing solutions and should be hand washed using a detergent-free procedure, for example containers for samples or solutions used in liquid chromatography coupled to mass spectrometry (LCMS) experiments in order to avoid contamination of the LCMS system.

fields.name: Aspiratable
fields.description: Indicates if this samples can be transferred out of this container when it is not Covered.

fields.name: Dispensable
fields.description: Indicates if this samples can be into this container when it is not Covered.

fields.name: UltrasonicIncompatible
fields.description: Indicates if volume measurements of samples contained within objects of this model are likely to give errant readings when measurements are conducted via ultrasonic liquid level detection.

fields.name: PreferredWashBin
fields.description: Indicates the recommended bin for dishwashing this container.

fields.name: PreferredMixer
fields.description: Indicates the recommended mixer for this container.

fields.name: CompatibleCoverTypes
fields.description: The types of covers that are compatible with this container.

fields.name: CompatibleCoverFootprints
fields.description: The cover footprint that can fit on top of this container.

fields.name: BuiltInCover
fields.description: Indicates if the container has a cover that is physically attached and cannot be physically separated from the container (ex. centrifuge tube).

fields.name: Parafilm
fields.description: Indicates if containers of this model should have their covers sealed with parafilm by default.

fields.name: AluminumFoil
fields.description: Indicates if containers of this model should be wrapped in aluminum foil to protect the container contents from light by default.

fields.name: MinTemperature
fields.description: Minimum temperature this type of container can be exposed to and maintain structural integrity.

fields.name: MaxTemperature
fields.description: Maximum temperature this type of container can be exposed to and maintain structural integrity.

fields.name: MinVolume
fields.description: The minimum volume required to create a uniform layer at the bottom of the container, indicating the smallest volume needed to reliably aspirate from the container, measure spectral properties, etc.

fields.name: MaxVolume
fields.description: Maximum volume of fluid the vessel can hold.

fields.name: MaxNumberOfHours
fields.description: The amount of time this container can be used during experiments before performance is expected to degrade and the container should be replaced.

fields.name: MaxNumberOfUses
fields.description: The maximum number of uses for which this container is expected to perform before performance is expected to degrade and the container should be replaced.

fields.name: Products
fields.description: Products ordering information for this model.

fields.name: KitProducts
fields.description: Products ordering information for this model if this model is part of one or more kits.

fields.name: MixedBatchProducts
fields.description: Products ordering information for this model if this model is part of one or more mixed batches.

fields.name: ServiceProviders
fields.description: Companies that provide custom synthesis in this model.

fields.name: RentByDefault
fields.description: Indicates if this container should be 'rented' from the ECL rather than purchased when it is needed during the course of an experiment.

fields.name: QualificationFrequency
fields.description: A list of the Qualification models and their required frequencies.

fields.name: MaintenanceFrequency
fields.description: A list of the maintenance models and their required frequencies.

fields.name: ContinuousOperation
fields.description: Indicates if the container is required to operate continuously in the lab, regardless of if it is InUse by a specific protocol, such as a gas supply.

fields.name: SensorBarrier
fields.description: Sensors for which this model of container acts as a barrier. All such sensors located outside a container of this model are irrelevant to the container's contents.

fields.name: Dimensions
fields.description: The external dimensions of this model of container.

fields.name: InternalDiameter3D
fields.description: A list of the internal diameter of the container over the entire height of the container.

fields.name: CrossSectionalShape
fields.description: The shape of this container in the X-Y plane.

fields.name: Footprint
fields.description: Standard form factor of the exterior bottom portion of this model of container used to seat the container in an open position.

fields.name: Positions
fields.description: Spatial definitions of the positions that exist in this model of container.

fields.name: AvailableLayouts
fields.description: Readily available configurations of container models in specified positions within this container model.

fields.name: AllowedPositions
fields.description: Generates a pattern of all the valid position names for this model of container.

fields.name: ContainerImage2DFile
fields.description: A file containing a top-down (X-Y plane) image of this model of container.

fields.name: Shape2D
fields.description: A list of Graphics primitives corresponding to the 2D shape of this model of container.

fields.name: Shape3D
fields.description: A list of Graphics primitives corresponding to the 3D shape of this model of container.

fields.name: Connectors
fields.description: Specifications for the ends of this plumbing component that may connect to other plumbing components or instrument ports.

fields.name: Size
fields.description: The length of this container, in the direction of fluid flow.

fields.name: WiringConnectors
fields.description: Specifications for the ends of the wiring connectors on this Container model that may plug into and conductively connect to other wiring components or instrument wiring connectors.

fields.name: WiringLength
fields.description: The length of this container, in the direction of electricity flow.

fields.name: WiringDiameters
fields.description: For each member of WiringConnectors, its effective conductive diameter.

fields.name: Sterile
fields.description: Indicates that this model of container arrives sterile from the manufacturer.

fields.name: Sterilized
fields.description: Indicates if this model of container is sterilized by autoclaving upon receiving and, if it is reusable, after being cleaned before it is reused.

fields.name: SterilizationBag
fields.description: Indicates if this model of container is sealed in an autoclave bag before autoclaving. The bag protects its sterility until it is used.

fields.name: RNaseFree
fields.description: Indicates that this model of container is free of any RNases when received from the manufacturer.

fields.name: NucleicAcidFree
fields.description: Indicates if this model of container is tested to be not contaminated with DNA and RNA by the manufacturer.

fields.name: PyrogenFree
fields.description: Indicates if this model of container is tested to be not contaminated with endotoxin by the manufacturer.

fields.name: Preparable
fields.description: Indicates if this samples/items of this model maybe prepared as needed during the course of an experiment.
